Description: NO FEE! Fully Renovated 3 Bedroom 1 Bath Unit. A Commuters Dream! Ideally located just a 2 minute walk to Maverick Square and all the best that East Boston's Vibrant Jeffries Point has to offer. Modern Layout with the Living Room open to the New Kitchen featuring beautiful cabinetry, Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Countertops and an 8 foot Kitchen Island. Gorgeous Bathroom. Gleaming Hardwood Floors throughout. Gas heat and Ductless Air Conditioning. Rear Deck off Kitchen and Shared Rear Courtyard. Free Laundry! Showings to start August 1. Available for rent, starting September 1.
